achievements.title: Agile
achievements.content: I gained Professional Scrum Master I and Professional Scrum Product Owner I certifications (which you can see here: [https://www.scrum.org/user/1495821](https://www.scrum.org/user/1495821)). With this knowledge, I took on Scrum Master responsibilities for my team where I helped refocus my team on delivering valuable increments.

achievements.title: Python
achievements.content: The primary language I used while working at Sanger was Python. I became familiar with libraries such as Pydantic, Fastapi, Pytest as well as becoming familiar with Python’s OOP features.

achievements.title: Microservices
achievements.content: The product I worked on used a microservice architecture, where we faced data consistency challenges. Initially tasked with researching solutions like 2-Phase Commit and the Saga Pattern, I helped my team choose an eventual consistency approach based on my findings.

achievements.title: Test Driven Development
achievements.content: After being introduced to test-driven development, the “red-green-refactor” cycle is now my primary development workflow. This let me write cleaner and safer code.

achievements.title: DevOps
achievements.content: I learnt some DevOps skills while working at Sanger. I updated dockerfiles/docker-compose files to patch security bugs and add the ability to spin up MySQL/MongoDB instances locally. I also learnt some of the basics of Kubernetes (which was used to deploy our microservices).
